short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture the signals that matter about from the LinkedIn posts and contacts you care about.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Identify and capture prospects who interact with any public post on LinkedIn with the Common Room extension. In addition, leverage the full power of Common Room's Person360â„¢ platform to enrich and surface the most relevant data to any LinkedIn profile so you can act on the people that matter, when it matters.

NOTE: You will need a Common Room account to use the extension. If you don't already have an account, sign up at https://commonroom.io to get started with a free trial.
